body.p: A change is the addition, removal, or modification of anything that might have an impact on the delivery of an IT service. The change management process is the process used to control those changes. These include hardware (servers, routers, switches, etc.) and software (purchased or developed in house), as well as less obvious items such as documentation, policies, processes, and management tools.
Three types of changes are commonly found in higher education: standard, normal, and emergency.
